cidr_block.description: The CIDR block of the subnet.

ip_count.description: The number of IP addresses in the subnet.

is_default.description: Indicates whether this is the default subnet for the Availability Zone.

is_public.description: Indicates whether instances launched in this subnet receive a public IP address.

state.description: The current state of the subnet (e.g. available).

uid.description: The unique identifier of the subnet.

uid_alt.description: This is the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.

vpc_uid.description: The VPC ID of the subnet.

zone.caption: Availability Zone
zone.description: The Availability Zone of the subnet.
